Police Creating Accountability by Making Effective Recording Available Act of 2017
Police Creating Accountability by Making Effective Recording Available Act of 2017

A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to authorize a grant program to assist State and local law enforcement agencies in purchasing body-worn cameras and securely storing and maintaining recording data for law enforcement officers.
Police CAMERA Act of 2017
